blocks.name: df-cv
blocks.content: Define the covers relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68, whose notation we use. Ptak/Pulmannova's notation ` A <oH B ` is read " ` B ` covers ` A ` " or " ` A ` is covered by ` B ` " , and it means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between. See ~ cvbr and ~ cvbr2 for membership relations. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-md
blocks.content: Define the modular pair relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1, who use the notation (x,y)M for "the ordered pair <x,y> is a modular pair." See ~ mdbr for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-dmd
blocks.content: Define the dual modular pair relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1, who use the notation (x,y)M* for "the ordered pair <x,y> is a dual modular pair." See ~ dmdbr for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cvbr
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing ` B ` covers ` A ` , which means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between. Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm cvbr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bianabs(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cch, c1, cch, ccv, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wcel(c0, cch))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cch)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))), wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))))
  psseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))
  rexbidv(s0, cch, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wpss(c0, cv(s0)))
  psseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c1, cch)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wpss(c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))), wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  psseq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)

  psseq2(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))

thm cvbr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(c0[<oH]c1 ↔(c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bianabs((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[<oH]c1, (c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cch, c1, cch, ccv, ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))), ((hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧(hs0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(hs0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)))), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧(c0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), (hs0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(hs0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1))))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cch)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ⊊ hs1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(hs0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)), c0 ⊊ hs1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)))
  psseq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(hs0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)), ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)))
  rexbidv(s0, cch, hs0 = c0, (hs0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1), (c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ⊊ s0, s0 ⊊ hs1, c0 ⊊ s0)
  psseq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  anbi12d(hs1 = c1, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1))))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c1, c0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs1, c1, cch)
  anbi12d(hs1 = c1, c0 ⊊ hs1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)), c0 ⊊ c1, ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))
  psseq2(hs1, c1, c0)
  notbid(hs1 = c1, ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1)), ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, cch, hs1 = c1, (c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ hs1), (c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c1, c0 ⊊ s0, s0 ⊊ hs1, s0 ⊊ c1)
  psseq2(hs1, c1, s0)
  df-cv(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ s0 ∧ s0 ⊊ c1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cvbr2
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing ` B ` covers ` A ` . Definition of covers in [Kalmbach] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm cvbr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1))))))
  cvbr(s0, c0, c1)
  anbi2i(wpss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  bitri(wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wn(wrex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))), wral(s0, cch, wn(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  ralbii(s0, cch, wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1))))
  xchbinx(wi(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  iman(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))
  anass(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  anbi2i(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  dfpss2(cv(s0), c1)
  ralnex(s0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), c1)))
}

  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs1, cch, wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)))))

  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(hs0), cch)), wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wb(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0))))
  chpsscon3(c0, cv(hs0))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wb(wpss(cv(hs0), c1), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0)))))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wb(wpss(cv(hs0), c1), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0)))))
  chpsscon3(cv(hs0), c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wi(wa(wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cch, wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0))))))
  ancomsd(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, cch, wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)))))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0))), wrex(hs1, cch, wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)))))
  sylan(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0))), wrex(hs1, cch, wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)))), wcel(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cch))
  choccl(cv(hs0))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, cv(hs0))), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs0)), cfv(cort, c0)))

  rexlimdva(hs1, cch, wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0))), wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1))))

  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(hs1), cch)), wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs1)), c1), wpss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1))))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wb(wpss(cfv(cort, c1), cv(hs1)), wpss(cfv(cort, cv(hs1)), c1)))
  chpsscon1(c1, cv(hs1))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(hs1), cch), wb(wpss(cv(hs1), cfv(cort, c0)), wpss(c0, cfv(cort, cv(hs1)))))

thm cvnbtwn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wn(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))))

  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(c2, cch), wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wn(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1))))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cch), wn(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))), wa(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  cvbr(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantl(wpss(c0, c1), wn(wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1)))), wi(wcel(c2, cch), wn(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))))
  con3rr3(wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(c2, cch), wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c2, cch), wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, cch, wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  rspcev(hs0, c2, cch, wa(wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), wa(wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wpss(c0, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), c1), wpss(c0, c2), wpss(c2, c1))
  psseq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  psseq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)

thm cvnbtwn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)→(c0[<oH]c1 → ¬(c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1)))
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, (c0[<oH]c1 → ¬(c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1)))
  com23((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c2 ∈ CH, c0[<oH]c1, ¬(c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1))
  syl6bi((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[<oH]c1, (c2 ∈ CH → ¬(c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1)), (c0 ⊊ c1 ∧ ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊊ c1))))
  cvbr(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ⊊ c1, ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊊ c1)), (c2 ∈ CH → ¬(c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1)))
  con3rr3(∃(hs0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊊ c1)), c2 ∈ CH, (c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1))
  ex(c2 ∈ CH, (c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ CH,(c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊊ c1)))
  rspcev(hs0, c2, cch, (c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1), (c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊊ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, c0 ⊊ hs0, hs0 ⊊ c1, c0 ⊊ c2, c2 ⊊ c1)
  psseq2(hs0, c2, c0)
  psseq1(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊊ c2 ∧ c2 ⊊ c1))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H)→(¬(span ` { c1 })⊆ c0 → c0[<oH](c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))
} = {
  3imtr4d((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), ¬(span ` { c1 })⊆ c0, c0[<oH](c0[vH](span ` { c1 })), c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))))
  expcom((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })), (c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))))
  anim2i(c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cch, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), ((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))
  imp(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, (hs0 ∈ CH →((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))))
  com23(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))
  3exp(c0 ∈ CH, hs0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, ((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))))
  spansncv(c0, hs0, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, (¬(span ` { c1 })⊆ c0 ↔ c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))), (span ` { c1 })∈ CH)
  chnle(c0, (span ` { c1 }))
  syldan(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, (c0[<oH](c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))↔(c0 ⊊(c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,((c0 ⊊ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))→ hs0 =(c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))))), (c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))∈ CH)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, (c0[vH](span ` { c1 }))∈ CH, (span ` { c1 })∈ CH)
  spansnch(c1)
  chjcl(c0, (span ` { c1 }))
  cvbr2(hs0, c0, (c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[vH](span ` { c1 })))

blocks.name: mdbr
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing ` <. A , B >. ` is a modular pair. Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm dmdbr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(c0[MH*]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bianabs((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, cch, c1, cch, cdmd, ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))), ((hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ hs0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(hs0[vH]hs1))))), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1))))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ hs0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(hs0[vH]hs1)))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)))))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, cch)
  ralbidv(s0, cch, hs0 = c0, (hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ hs0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(hs0[vH]hs1))), (hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, hs1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ hs0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(hs0[vH]hs1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)))
  eqeq12d(((s0 ⋂ hs0)[vH]hs1), (s0 ⋂(hs0[vH]hs1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((s0 ⋂ hs0), chj, hs1, (s0 ⋂ c0), hs0 = c0)
  ineq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  ineq2d(s0, (hs0[vH]hs1), (c0[vH]hs1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, chj, hs1)
  anbi12d(hs1 = c1, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ hs1 ∈ CH), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)))), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c1, c0 ∈ CH, hs1 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  eleq1(hs1, c1, cch)
  ralbidv(s0, cch, hs1 = c1, (hs1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1))), (c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  imbi12d(hs1 = c1, hs1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  sseq1(hs1, c1, s0)
  eqeq12d(((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]hs1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]hs1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), hs1 = c1)
  oveq2(hs1, c1, (s0 ⋂ c0), chj)
  ineq2d(s0, (c0[vH]hs1), (c0[vH]c1), hs1 = c1)
  oveq2(hs1, c1, c0, chj)
  df-dmd(hs0, hs1, s0)

  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cch), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))))
  chdmj1(c0, c1)

thm dmdi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c2))), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))))
} = {
  imp32(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  3impa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wi(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  sylan9(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(c2, cch), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))), wral(hs0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(hs0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  dmdbr(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspcv(hs0, c2, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1)))), wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eqeq12d(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1d(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1, cin(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c2, co(c0, chj, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)))))
}

thm dmdi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)∧(c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))→((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
} = {
  imp32((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, c1 ⊆ c2, ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  3impa(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, (c0[MH*]c1 →(c1 ⊆ c2 →((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  sylan9((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c2 ∈ CH, c0[MH*]c1, (c1 ⊆ c2 →((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  biimpd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  dmdbr(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspcv(hs0, c2, cch, (c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))), (c1 ⊆ c2 →((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, c1 ⊆ hs0, ((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c1 ⊆ c2, ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  sseq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  eqeq12d(((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), hs0 = c2)
  oveq1d((hs0 ⋂ c0), chj, c1, (c2 ⋂ c0), hs0 = c2)
  ineq1(hs0, c2, c0)
  ineq1(hs0, c2, (c0[vH]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆ c2 →((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
}

blocks.name: dmdbr2

thm dmdbr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1)))), wral(s0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  dmdbr(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbidva(s0, cch, wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)))), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1))))
  pm5.74d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1)))
  syl6(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wb(wceq(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1))), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))))
  syl6ib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wa(wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))))
  jctird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0))), wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  mpani(w3a(wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cin(cv(s0), c0), cv(s0)))
  inss1(cv(s0), c0)
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wa(wss(cin(cv(s0), c0), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0))), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0)))
  chlub(cin(cv(s0), c0), c1, cv(s0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cv(s0), cch)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch))
  chincl(cv(s0), c0)
  simpll(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(cv(s0), cch))
  mpan2(w3a(wcel(cin(cv(s0), c0), cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(cin(cv(s0), c0), c0))
  inss2(cv(s0), c0)
  chlej1(cin(cv(s0), c0), c0, c1)
  ssin(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))
  baib(wss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wceq(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1)))
  eqss(co(cin(cv(s0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cch)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)

thm dmdbr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(c0[MH*]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1))), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  dmdbr(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbidva(s0, cch, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))), (c1 ⊆ s0 →(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)))
  pm5.74d(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1))
  syl6(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, (((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))↔(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  syl6ib(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆ s0 ∧((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1)))
  jctird(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), (c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆ s0), (s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH)
  simpr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), s0 ∈ CH)
  mpani(((s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆ s0, (s0 ⋂ c0)⊆ s0)
  inss1(s0, c0)
  biimpd(((s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH), ((s0 ⋂ c0)⊆ s0 ∧ c1 ⊆ s0), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆ s0)
  chlub((s0 ⋂ c0), c1, s0)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ s0 ∈ CH), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH, (s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH, (s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH)
  chincl(s0, c0)
  simpll(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH)
  simplr(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, s0 ∈ CH)
  mpan2(((s0 ⋂ c0)∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂ c0)⊆ c0)
  inss2(s0, c0)
  chlej1((s0 ⋂ c0), c0, c1)
  ssin(((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), s0, (c0[vH]c1))
  baib(((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))⊆((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1))
  eqss(((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))

blocks.content: Binary relation expressing the dual modular pair property. This version quantifies an equality instead of an inference. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmdbr3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wceq(co(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1), cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wceq(co(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1), cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)))), wral(hs0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1), cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1))))))
  dmdbr(hs0, c0, c1)

thm dmdbr3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→(c0[MH*]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  dmdbr(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  impbid(c1 ∈ CH, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  ralrimdv(s0, cch, c1 ∈ CH, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  com3l(c1 ∈ CH, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), s0 ∈ CH, (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  ex(s0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))→(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  mpid((s0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1))
  ancoms(s0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1))
  chub2(c1, s0)
  syl((s0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))→(c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1)→(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), (s0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  chjcl(s0, c1)
  rspcv(hs0, (s0[vH]c1), cch, (c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))), (c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1)→(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  imbi12d(hs0 =(s0[vH]c1), c1 ⊆ hs0, ((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  sseq2(hs0, (s0[vH]c1), c1)
  eqeq12d(((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1), ((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), hs0 =(s0[vH]c1))
  oveq1d((hs0 ⋂ c0), chj, c1, ((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0), hs0 =(s0[vH]c1))
  ineq1(hs0, (s0[vH]c1), c0)
  ineq1(hs0, (s0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1))
  syl6ib(c1 ∈ CH, ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ CH,(c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))))
  ralimdva(s0, cch, c1 ∈ CH, (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  com23((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  ex((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, ((((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))→((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  biimpd(((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH)∧ c1 ⊆ s0), (((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  eqeq12d((((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1), ((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH)∧ c1 ⊆ s0))
  oveq1d(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0), chj, c1, (s0 ⋂ c0), ((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH)∧ c1 ⊆ s0))
  ineq1d((s0[vH]c1), c0, s0, ((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH)∧ c1 ⊆ s0))
  ineq1d((s0[vH]c1), (c0[vH]c1), s0, ((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH)∧ c1 ⊆ s0))
  biimpa((c1 ∈ CH ∧ s0 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ s0, (s0[vH]c1)= s0)
  chlejb2(c1, s0)
  cbvralv(s0, hs0, cch, (c1 ⊆ s0 →((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))), (c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, c1 ⊆ s0, ((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c1 ⊆ hs0, ((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  sseq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqeq12d(((s0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (s0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), ((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), (hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1d((s0 ⋂ c0), chj, c1, (hs0 ⋂ c0), s0 = hs0)
  ineq1(s0, hs0, c0)
  ineq1(s0, hs0, (c0[vH]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cch)
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs0, cch, (c1 ⊆ hs0 →((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  diff.hs0.c((s0[vH]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆(s0[vH]c1)→(((s0[vH]c1)⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=((s0[vH]c1)⋂(c0[vH]c1))))
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, c1 ⊆ hs0, ((hs0 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)=(hs0 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, hs0)

blocks.name: dmdbr4
blocks.content: Binary relation expressing the dual modular pair property. This version quantifies an ordering instead of an inference. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm dmdbr4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wss(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wss(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c1), c0), chj, c1))), wral(hs0, cch, wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cin(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1)), co(cin(cv(hs0), c0), chj, c1)))))
  dmdbr2(hs0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: mdsl0
blocks.content: A sublattice condition that transfers the modular pair property. Exercise 12 of [Kalmbach] p. 103. Also Lemma 1.5.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧(c2 ∈ CH ∧ c3 ∈ CH))→((((c2 ⊆ c0 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H)∧ c0[MH]c1)→ c2[MH]c3))

thm dmdsl3(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)∧(c1[MH*]c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1)))→((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0)= c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0), c2, (c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)∧(c1[MH*]c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))))
  3adantr3((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1[MH*]c0, c0 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), ((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0)=(c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)))
  imp32((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1[MH*]c0, c0 ⊆ c2, ((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0)=(c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)))
  3com12(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, (c1[MH*]c0 →(c0 ⊆ c2 →((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0)=(c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)))))
  exp32((c1 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1[MH*]c0, c0 ⊆ c2, ((c2 ⋂ c1)[vH]c0)=(c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)))
  dmdi(c1, c0, c2)
  3ad2antr3((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1[MH*]c0, c0 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0))= c2)
  sylan9req((c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)), c2, (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))=(c2 ⋂(c1[vH]c0)))
  ineq2d(c2, (c0[vH]c1), (c1[vH]c0), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  chjcom(c0, c1)
  biimpi(c2 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))= c2)
  df-ss(c2, (c0[vH]c1))
}

blocks.name: mdsl3
blocks.content: Sublattice mapping for a modular pair. Part of Theorem 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm mdslle1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0))), wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c3, c0))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wcel(c3, cch)
} = {
  impbid2(w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0))), wss(c2, c3), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c3, c0)))
  ssrin(c2, c3, c0)
  syl5ib(w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0))), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c3, c0)), wss(c2, c3), wss(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), co(cin(c3, c0), chj, c1)))
  chlej1i(cin(c2, c0), cin(c3, c0), c1)
  chincli(c2, c0)
  chincli(c3, c0)
  sseq12d(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), co(cin(c3, c0), chj, c1), c2, c3, w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0))))
  syl3an(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0)), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  simplbi(wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, c3))
  simplbi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0)), wss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0)), wss(c3, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  mpan(w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0))), wceq(co(cin(c2, c0), chj, c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  dmdsl3(c1, c0, c2)
  syl3an(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0)), wceq(co(cin(c3, c0), chj, c1), c3), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  id(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
  simprbi(wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c3), wss(c1, c2))
  bicomi(wss(c1, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, c3)))
  ssin(c1, c2, c3)
  simprbi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0)), wss(c3, co(c1, chj, c0)), wss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  bicomi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c1, chj, c0)), wa(wss(c2, co(c1, chj, c0)), wss(c3, co(c1, chj, c0))))
  chlubi(c2, co(c1, chj, c0), c3)
  chjcli(c1, c0)
  mpan(w3a(wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, co(c1, chj, c0))), wceq(co(cin(c3, c0), chj, c1), c3), w3a(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c3, cch)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c3, cch))
  dmdsl3(c1, c0, c3)
}

thm mdslle1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0))→(c2 ⊆ c3 ↔(c2 ⋂ c0)⊆(c3 ⋂ c0)))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
} = {
  impbid2((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0)), c2 ⊆ c3, (c2 ⋂ c0)⊆(c3 ⋂ c0))
  ssrin(c2, c3, c0)
  syl5ib((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0)), (c2 ⋂ c0)⊆(c3 ⋂ c0), c2 ⊆ c3, ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)⊆((c3 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1))
  chlej1i((c2 ⋂ c0), (c3 ⋂ c0), c1)
  chincli(c2, c0)
  chincli(c3, c0)
  sseq12d(((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), ((c3 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1), c2, c3, (c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0)))
  syl3an(c0[MH*]c1, c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0), ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)= c2, c0[MH*]c1, c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))
  simplbi(c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c3)
  simplbi((c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0), c2 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), c3 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))
  mpan((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)), ((c2 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)= c2, (c1 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH))
  3pm3.2i(c1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH)
  dmdsl3(c1, c0, c2)
  syl3an(c0[MH*]c1, c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0), ((c3 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)= c3, c0[MH*]c1, c1 ⊆ c3, c3 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))
  id(c0[MH*]c1)
  simprbi(c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), c1 ⊆ c3, c1 ⊆ c2)
  bicomi(c1 ⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c3))
  ssin(c1, c2, c3)
  simprbi((c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0), c3 ⊆(c1[vH]c0), c2 ⊆(c1[vH]c0))
  bicomi((c2[vH]c3)⊆(c1[vH]c0), (c2 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)∧ c3 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)))
  chlubi(c2, (c1[vH]c0), c3)
  chjcli(c1, c0)
  mpan((c0[MH*]c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c3 ∧ c3 ⊆(c1[vH]c0)), ((c3 ⋂ c0)[vH]c1)= c3, (c1 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ CH ∧ c3 ∈ CH))
  3pm3.2i(c1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c3 ∈ CH)
  dmdsl3(c1, c0, c3)
}

thm mdslle2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1)), wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(co(c2, chj, c0), co(c3, chj, c0))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)

  -| wcel(c2, cch)

} = {
  impbid2(w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1)), wss(c2, c3), wss(co(c2, chj, c0), co(c3, chj, c0)))
  chlej1i(c2, c3, c0)
  syl5ib(w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1)), wss(co(c2, chj, c0), co(c3, chj, c0)), wss(c2, c3), wss(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1)))
  ssrin(co(c2, chj, c0), co(c3, chj, c0), c1)
  sseq12d(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1), c2, c3, w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1)))
  syl3an(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), wceq(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), c2), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(c2, c1))
  simplbi(wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(cin(c0, c1), c3))
  simplbi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  mpan(w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  mdsl3(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3an(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), wceq(cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1), c3), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c3), wss(c3, c1))
  id(wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  simprbi(wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(cin(c0, c1), c3), wss(cin(c0, c1), c2))
  bicomi(wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c2), wss(cin(c0, c1), c3)))
  ssin(cin(c0, c1), c2, c3)
  simprbi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), wss(c3, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  bicomi(wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))
  chlubi(c2, c1, c3)
  mpan(w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c3), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c3, cch)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c3, cch))
  mdsl3(c0, c1, c3)

thm mdslle2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[MH]c1 ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1)→(c2 ⊆ c3 ↔(c2[vH]c0)⊆(c3[vH]c0)))

  simplbi((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c3)
  simplbi((c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1)
  mpan((c0[MH]c1 ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)= c2, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ CH))
  3pm3.2i(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH)
  mdsl3(c0, c1, c2)
  syl3an(c0[MH]c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, ((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1)= c3, c0[MH]c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c3, c3 ⊆ c1)
  id(c0[MH]c1)
  simprbi((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c3, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2)
  bicomi((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2 ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c3))
  ssin((c0 ⋂ c1), c2, c3)
  simprbi((c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  bicomi((c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  chlubi(c2, c1, c3)

thm mdslj1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0)), wa(wss(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c0, chj, c1)))), wceq(cin(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), co(cin(c2, c1), chj, cin(c3, c1))))

  bicomi(wss(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, c3)))
  ssin(c0, c2, c3)

  chlubi(c2, co(c0, chj, c1), c3)
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  3expb(wa(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, c3)), wa(wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c3, co(c0, chj, c1))), wss(cin(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), co(cin(c2, c1), chj, cin(c3, c1))))
  sseqtrd(cin(co(c2, chj, c3), c1), co(cin(c2, c1), chj, cin(c3, c1)), cin(co(co(cin(c2, c1), chj, cin(c3, c1)), chj, c0), c1), w3a(wa(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, c3)), wa(wss(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c3, co(c0, chj, c1)))))

blocks.name: mdsl1i
blocks.content: If the modular pair property holds in a sublattice, it holds in the whole lattice. Lemma 1.4 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdsl1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(s0), chj, cin(c0, c1)))))), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbii(wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(s0), chj, cin(c0, c1)))))), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))

blocks.name: mdsl2i
blocks.content: If the modular pair property holds in a sublattice, it holds in the whole lattice. Lemma 1.4 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mdsl2i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(s0), chj, cin(c0, c1))))))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitr2i(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(s0), chj, cin(c0, c1))))), wral(s0, cch, wi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), co(c0, chj, c1))), wi(wss(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cin(co(cv(s0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(s0), chj, cin(c0, c1)))))))

  mpan2(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  chub2i(c1, c0)

  syl6(wa(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cch)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cin(co(cv(hs0), chj, c0), c1), co(cv(hs0), chj, cin(c0, c1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))

thm cvmdi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → c0[MH]c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
} = {
  sylib((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[MH]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH,(((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))→(hs0 ⊆ c1 →((hs0[vH]c0)⋂ c1)=(hs0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1))))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cch, (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, (((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))→(hs0 ⊆ c1 →((hs0[vH]c0)⋂ c1)=(hs0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1)))))
  exp4b((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, hs0 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1)), hs0 ⊆ c1, ((hs0[vH]c0)⋂ c1)=(hs0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1)))
  syl5bi(((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ CH), (((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), ((hs0[vH]c0)⋂ c1)=(hs0[vH](c0 ⋂ c1)), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))

blocks.name: mdslmd1i
blocks.content: Preservation of the modular pair property in the one-to-one onto mapping between the two sublattices in Lemma 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2 (meet version). (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:

thm mdslmd2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

} = {
  bitr2d(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1))), wbr(c2, cmd, c3), wbr(co(c2, chj, c0), cmd, co(c3, chj, c0)), wbr(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), cmd, cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1)))

  breq12d(cin(co(c2, chj, c0), c1), cmd, cin(co(c3, chj, c0), c1), c2, c3, w3a(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), c1)))

thm mdslmd2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0[MH]c1 ∧ c1[MH*]c0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1))→(c2[MH]c3 ↔(c2[vH]c0)[MH](c3[vH]c0)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c3 ∈ CH
} = {
  bitr2d(((c0[MH]c1 ∧ c1[MH*]c0)∧((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1)), c2[MH]c3, (c2[vH]c0)[MH](c3[vH]c0), ((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)[MH]((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1))
  sylan2((c0[MH]c1 ∧ c1[MH*]c0), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1), ((c2[vH]c0)[MH](c3[vH]c0)↔((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)[MH]((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1)), (c0 ⊆((c2[vH]c0)⋂(c3[vH]c0))∧((c2[vH]c0)[vH](c3[vH]c0))⊆(c0[vH]c1)))
  jctil(((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1), c0 ⊆((c2[vH]c0)⋂(c3[vH]c0)), ((c2[vH]c0)[vH](c3[vH]c0))⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  adantl((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, ((c2[vH]c0)[vH](c3[vH]c0))⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  3sstr3g(((c2[vH]c0)[vH](c3[vH]c0)), (c0[vH]c1), ((c2[vH]c3)[vH]c0), (c1[vH]c0), (c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1)

  chjcli(c2, c3)

  mdslmd1i(c0, c1, (c2[vH]c0), (c3[vH]c0))
  chjcli(c2, c0)
  chjcli(c3, c0)
  adantlr(c0[MH]c1, c1[MH*]c0, ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1), (((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)[MH]((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1)↔ c2[MH]c3))
  3expb(c0[MH]c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, (((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)[MH]((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1)↔ c2[MH]c3))
  breq12d(((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1), cmd, ((c3[vH]c0)⋂ c1), c2, c3, (c0[MH]c1 ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3)∧(c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1))
  syl3an(c0[MH]c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, ((c2[vH]c0)⋂ c1)= c2, c0[MH]c1, (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ c1)
  mpan2((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆(c2 ⋂ c3), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c2, (c2 ⋂ c3)⊆ c2)
  inss1(c2, c3)
  sstr((c0 ⋂ c1), (c2 ⋂ c3), c2)
  mpan((c2[vH]c3)⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆(c2[vH]c3))

blocks.origin:
thm mdsldmd1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c1, cdmd, c0)), wa(wss(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wss(co(c2, chj, c3), co(c0, chj, c1)))), wb(wbr(c2, cdmd, c3), wbr(cin(c2, c1), cdmd, cin(c3, c1))))

blocks.name: mdexchi
blocks.content: An exchange lemma for modular pairs. Lemma 1.6 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cvmd
blocks.content: The covering property implies the modular pair property. Lemma 7.5.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧(c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1)→ c0[MH]c1)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[MH]c1)
  dedth2h(c0, chba, c1, chba, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, ((c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → c0[MH]c1), ((if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ c1)[<oH]c1 → if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)[MH]c1), ((if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))[<oH]if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H)→ if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)[MH]if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H)))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[MH]c1, (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)[MH]c1)
  breq1d((c0 ⋂ c1), ccv, c1, (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ c1), c0 = if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H))
  ineq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), c1)
  breq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), cmd, c1)
  imbi12d(c1 = if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)[MH]c1, (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))[<oH]if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)[MH]if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))
  breq12d((if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ c1), ccv, c1, (if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H)⋂ if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H)), if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), c1 = if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))
  ineq2(c1, if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H))
  id(c1 = if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))
  breq2(c1, if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H), if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), cmd)
  cvmdi(if(c0 ∈ CH, c0, ~H), if(c1 ∈ CH, c1, ~H))
  ifchhv(c0)
  ifchhv(c1)
}

blocks.name: cvdmd
blocks.content: The covering property implies the dual modular pair property. Lemma 7.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvdmd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
  3imtr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wbr(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), cmd, cfv(cort, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wi(wbr(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), cmd, cfv(cort, c1))), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c1), cch))
  choccl(c0)
  choccl(c1)
  3expia(wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c1), cch), wbr(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), cmd, cfv(cort, c1)))
  cvmd(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  cvcon3(c1, co(c0, chj, c1))
  breq1d(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, cfv(cort, c1), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)))
  chdmj1(c0, c1)
  dmdmd(c0, c1)
}
